channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Stellantis threatens to kill production in the UK, saying the country has set sales targets for electric cars way too high
item.description: Managing director Maria Grazia Davino said Stellantis would be forced to make discounts to meet the targets.

item.title: This small-cap tech stock is set to rally nearly 30%, TD Cowen says
item.description: Secular industry tailwinds and a diversifying consumer base set up this tech stock to be TD Cowen's top small- and mid-cap pick.

item.title: Jobs component of confidence data allows Fed to keep eye on inflation: economist
Portfolio manager known for ‘The Big Short’ isn’t worried about Nvidia sell-off: ‘I don’t think it means anything’
item.description: Nvidia was still up 139% this year through Monday’s close.

item.title: Here's how bad housing affordability is now
item.description: Home prices are now 47% higher than they were in early 2020, with the median sale price now five times the median household income.

item.title: Americans are snapping up hybrid cars. These are some of the best values today.
Chili’s offers lifetime supply of free burgers
item.description: Among the runner-up prizes? A BurgerTime Arcade cabinet.

item.title: Nvidia's half-a-trillion dollar wipeout leaves global chip stocks volatile
item.description: Global semiconductor stocks saw volatile trading on Tuesday after a slump in shares of Nvidia during the previous session.

item.title: Tax-increase protesters set part of Kenyan parliament ablaze
Prepping for the ‘unthinkable,’ Norway is stockpiling 30,000 tons of grain, citing the war in Ukraine, the pandemic, and climate change
item.description: The Scandinavian country stopped storing grain in 2003, but following Russia's 2022 invasion of Ukraine began reconsidering the program.

item.title: Trump Media stock wavers as DJT struggles to claw back losses after major sell-off
item.description: The recent moves for DJT followed a sell-off that began after a Manhattan jury found Donald Trump guilty of 34 felony counts of falsifying business records.

item.title: Nvidia execs have been selling shares. That may not mean what you think it does.
Tesla issues its fourth Cybertruck recall in seven months because parts of the six-figure EV can come loose
item.description: The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration announced Tuesday the recall may affect more than 11,000 trucks.

item.title: A bearish options trade that wins if Nvidia and the QQQs continue to cool off
item.description: Nishant Pant with a way to profit from the pullback in key chip stocks this week.

item.title: Jobs component bears watching when consumer-confidence data hit: strategist
